A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly one of the worst films I've seen in a long time. Don't waste your money on this film. There's no characterization\, everyone is flat and lifeless. The writing is terrible throughout\, and Luke's character was totally butchered. I left the theater angry on opening night. It felt like the whole film was set up to sell you stuffed porgs and star wars t shirts. No artistry or love was put into the making of this film. Just businessmen trying to make money.
